text: Gregory Sierra (January 25, 1937 â€“ January 4, 2021) was an American actor. He was known for his roles as Detective Sergeant Chano Amenguale on Barney Miller and as Julio Fuentes on Sanford and Son.The New York Times Sierra died on January 4, 2021 from stomach and liver cancer at his home in Laguna Woods, California at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:Deaths from liver cancer
